title: Body Text - Modern Magazine
content:
Hi guys,

do you know which is the body text for this magazine? not the one which says "64" but the body text. Now that i see it both seems the same.

Thanks ;)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [2011-03-Traveler-Leitura-3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824193201/http:/typophile.com/files/2011-03-Traveler-Leitura-3.jpg) | 117.65 KB |
author: uzapucax

comments.content: What about [Leitura News](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824193201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura-news) as on their [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824193201/http:/www.cntraveler.com/) (and suggested by the sample file title)?

Oops! you are right. I should have checked the name of the image before. I was reading and article that says Esquire Magazine used Mercury as body copy font and that particular font didn't look too much like Mercury to me. That is why the confusion was.

thanks!
